title: BOWLING FOR VOTES!
text: Trump invites conservative naysayers BOWLING as 'Freedom Caucus' Republicans say Trumpcare legislation is a gutter ball White House has its own bowling alley in the basement, underneath the North Portico's driveway Donald Trump will entertain some of the most right-wing members of Congress there on Thursday to try and talk them into supporting his health care bill A Capitol Hill spokesman says bowling could be a monthly or even weekly thing Bowling at 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue dates back to the Truman administration; the current alley was installed during the Nixon years Trump's son Don Jr. took his family there the day following Inauguration Day
